InventoryCountPlanItem.name: InventoryCountPlanItem
InventoryCountPlanItem.description: Represents a product in an inventory plan. Inventory Count Plan Item is the child object of Inventory Count Plan.

AssigneeId.description: The assignee who's scheduled to count the product's inventory.

Comment.description: A comment, note, or instruction that gives additional context for the plan to count the product's inventory.

InventoryCountPlanId.description: The inventory count plan associated with the inventory count plan item.

IsBlindCount.description: Indicates whether the expected inventory quantity is hidden from the assignee when they count the inventory (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record indirectly, for example, through a list view or related record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, and LastReferenceDate is not null, the user accessed this record or list view indirectly.

Name.description: Name of the inventory count plan item.

ProductReferenceRecordId.description: The product associated with the inventory count plan item.
